CustomField.description: Per Case #14954879, on 8/1/14 FLurz changed Field Label from Extension Until to Proposed Cancel Date, and changed Field Name from Extension_Until to Proposed_Cancel_Date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This date will automatically calculate when the client should be officially canceled from the service. (HRE Clients will automatically calculate as 30 days from the Cancel Requested On field)
CustomField.label: Proposed Cancel Date
